name: CategoryTree
description:

> üìò Onboarding guide 
>
> Check the new [Catalog onboarding guide](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/docs/catalog-overview). We created this guide to improve the onboarding experience for developers at VTEX. Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

categoryLevels.description: Value of the category level you need to retrieve.

$ul: **children**: Array with information about the category's children.
**hasChildren**: If the category has a category child (`true`) or not (`false`).
